name: Sea Battle Simulator Pro
description:
You are the Captain of the HMS Destroyer, a Royal Navy frigate. Your mission is to engage and destroy enemy ships in different naval battles.

Features:
- Stunning full 3D graphics and lights effects
- Historically based ships and weapons
- No Ads.
- Smooth and simple ship control system!
- Easy to learn hard to master!

We will update and improve this game constantly.
